name: Abominal Binder
description:
Client is a mother of 7 (F/15, F/9, F/8, M/7, F/5, F3, M/newborn). 
She just gave birth on 30th August 2021. Client and her husband currently live in a 1-room-1-hall with F/9, M/7, F/3 and M/newborn. 
The other 3 children are presently in the care of relatives and foster parents. 
FSC is currently in discussion on the reunification plans for all the children, projected to be by end 2021. 
Client has been unable to work due to gestational hypertension, which requires long periods of rest, and her husband is currently unemployed as he is taking care of the children and accompanying her for gynae visits. 
As client has just given birth, she requires an abdominal binder to augment the recovery process after her cesarean section (c-section).
specifications: 3 Panels Dale Abdominal Binder, Measurement for Female Hip size: Stretches 90cm - 117cm (GREEN), M(411)

name: Omron Hem 7120 Blood pressure monitor
description:
An elderly staying with her mother is requesting for a OMRON HEM 7120 Blood Pressure Monitor. She has recently received doctor’s advice to 
monitor her blood pressure with a blood pressure monitor due to the daily stresses around 
her. They are both unemployed due to multiple medical conditions.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Janetta Tan

name: XL size - Tena Pull up diapers
description:
Client is an elderly lady in her 80s, living with dementia. 
Due to her frail condition, she requires pull-up diapers for her toileting. 

Family is a low-income family and is unable to cover the cost of her diapers.

name: home phone

Apart from daily expenses, children are unable to afford additional expenses because they are all low income earners. Would like to seek donation of 2 months' supply (48 packets) of Resource Fruit Flavoured Beverage (orange and / or wildberry flavour).

Email: dik@childrensociety.org.sg. Contact No.: 9436 7401. *Note: Delivery costs will be covered by donors. We appreciate your kind donation and generosity. Everyone can make a difference!

name: 10 tubs of 2.75kg of Planta Margarine
description: We are requesting for 10 tubs of 2.75kg of Planta Margarine for cooking use or meal for our residents from Monday to Saturday. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premises.

name: Food Rations

Requesting halal food rations for needy families who may not have money to buy food Items due to financial issues

name: E-Bike
description: A family of 3 with a young child aged 3 requires an e-bike to work as a food delivery person. Currently, they have one e-bike but would require another one so that both husband & wife can work full time.

name: Request for TPG compatible mobile phone for elderly please
description:
Client is a 72 year old elderly who lives in rental housing. She is currently in between job and makes many calls for job search purposes. As a result, she has been topping up approximately $30-$40 a month to her prepaid card which is quite costly to her. She heard about TPG and has signed up for the $10 per month plan in hope to reduce her expenses. 

Her current phone is not TPG compatible. As such, she needs to use the TPG app to make calls, in which she has difficulty accessing which limits her call making.

Client hopes to be able to self-reliant and continue working as she is still in good general health. Hence, she hopes to have a TPG compatible phone which she is unable to afford due to her unemployment and limited savings. Thank you very much for your consideration and attention!

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Jesline Teo Kia Ling

name: Mobility scooter (including ramps to install at main door)
description: Client (44/F) is a single mother and sole breadwinner of 3 children who has multiple health condition and a recent amputation in her toes from diabetic condition which affects her mobility in both legs that is painful and weakening in functioning and affecting her ability to walk. She lost her job and is also not able to continue working to provide for the family. Client is requesting for donations for a mobility scooter (including ramps to install at main door) to allow her to independently travel for her various and regular medical appointments and to purchase her own meals as her children are still schooling and often have difficulties accompanying her or purchase her meals on her behalf. This will also help client to regain some independence and alleviate some of her grief over the many losses she is experiencing.

description: Clt's husband suffered lost of income due to covid. They would appreciate receiving support for milk and diapers so that they can clear their outstanding bills. Diapers- Huggies - Nature made (L size) Enfamil A+ stage 2

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Kee Ru Wei

name: Diapers & Milk powder
description: Client looking for a kind-hearted donor to support the family with diapers and milk powder. Due to the strained marital relationship, the mother single-handedly taking care of her 7 children ages range from infant to 14 yrs old in an HDB rental unit. Mother quit employment after delivery of her 7th child late last year as she is the primary caregiver and her existing medical condition. Essential items needed are Diapers M size and XXL size and milk powder Nan Optipro2 (stage 2) and Abbot Grow Preschool (stage 4)for her young ones. Do not hesitate to contact me at 94348233 should you be able to help. Thanks much!

contact.org: Hougang Sheng Hong Family Service Centre
contact.name: Dennis Ng

name: (URGENT) Milk powder and Diapers for baby
description:
Low income family of 6 requesting for
3 x Merries DIapers XL Size	
8 x Similac Total Comfort Infant Formula

Require Donor to send/order delivery to needy family and to pay for the delivery fee

name: Motorised wheelchair
description:
Client is a stroke survivor, who is independent in his daily tasks. However, he is dependent on a motorised wheelchair to go around the community e.g. going for medical appointments or buying his own meals. Due to a bed bug infestation, he will require a new motorised wheelchair to allow him to continue being independent within home and in the community. He will benefit greatly from kind donors who can support him in getting a new motorised wheelchair in view of the high cost. 

Motorised wheelchair model: DNR Cruz 40/0290/16 – 16.0” inch seat width.

name: Good And Sturdy Wheelchair (For Home Use)
description:
Client is a single mother of a teenager son. The mother and son resides in a 2 room HDB flat, and the single parent is unemployed due to complicating health issues. Being unemployed, client does not have additional savings and solely relies on kind donations (e.g., food rations) and SSO financial assistance for day to day necessities.
Due to her health condition, she is unable to walk and relies on a wheelchair to move around. As the current one has been worn out, she has kindly requested for a preloved item to replace the one that she has. 
Client is about 130kg , hence will need a sturdy wheelchair that can sustain her weight and move around in the house.
specifications: Client is 130kg, she will need a wheelchair that can sustain her weight. Thank you.

name: Wheelchair with elevated foot rest
description: Father is the sole breadwinner earning a low-income for the household of 4 living in government rental housing, with a young child diagnosed with special needs. The family is requesting for a wheelchair with elevated foot rest for grandfather who recently met with a traffic accident and is unable to rest well on the current donated wheelchair with fixed footrest.

contact.org: Fei Yue - Early Intervention Centre For Children
contact.name: Tessa Nai

name: Electric Scooter
description: Elderly man requires portable electronic scooter due to his legs being weakened  after decades of damage from kidney transport, swelling and also having blood clots.

name: PMD Mobility Scooter
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC), Mdm S, is living alone in Ang Mo Kio Ave 4 and requires her daily usage of PMD to be mobile within the community. However, her PMD is wearing down and requires a repair or a replacement. As she has already utilised the SMF funding for her current PMD, she would not be eligible for a 2nd motorized device. 
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking either financial assistance in repairs or donation of a PMD.  
 
If you know of someone who can assist in either, please contact caseworker Anthony at 96546542 or anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg. We would appreciate if the donor can deliver the item to the client’s place at Blk 257 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 4. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg .

contact.org: THK Cluster Support @ Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Anthony Wang

name: motorize wheelchair
description: Client is an elderly man with diabetes. Due to water retention he is not able to walk very well. His elderly wife is unable to push him on a wheelchair, and he has a frozen shoulder, making it difficult to wheel himself. As such, he would like to request for a motorized wheelchair so he can move around more easily

The family recently moved into their new rental unit from a rented room and has been trying to complete their home with essential household items. While this appears to be an improved social circumstance for the family, it may be financially heavy for the family.

Therefore, to further reduce expenses, a donation of a top loader washing machine would be greatly appreciated. Thank you very much. (Nasuha)

name: Washing Machine
description: Client is a single mother, raising 3 children in her household. She is currently unemployed due to caregiving responsibilities as well as her multiple physical health concerns. Her washing machine has broken down recently and is unable to afford a new washing machine. She has been washing her family's clothes and bedsheets manually, but her multiple physical ailments have made it difficult for her to do so. Her children has eczema so she is not able to cut down on her washing. As such, case worker would like to request for donations for a washing machine for the family. This would help the client with maintaining the cleanliness and hygiene of the home environment for her and her children. We request for the donor would have to bear the cost of moving as well. A washing machine with Top Open, 15kg, preferably with drying function.

name: Washing Machine
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) Mr C was recently discharged from hospital due to a wound injury. He lives alone and his house is currently undergoing decluttering. His case worker has arranged for Home Personal Care, but his washing machine has broken down.  
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking for a donation of a washing machine, which will enable our Health Care Assistants to assist him in his laundry.  
     
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Case Worker Anthony Wang at 9654 6542. We appreciate if the donor could deliver the item to the client’s place at Ang Mo Kio Ave 5. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

name: Laptop / Tablet

The teenager is keen to be engaged by youth agency programmes but due to current covid situation, activities are online. However given family’s financial constraints, teenager is unable to have a laptop or tablet to access these online activities. The donation of a laptop or tablet would be most helpful to enable teenager to be linked to the youth programmes and activities to be engaged meaningfully.

name: Laptop/tablet/ webcam / microphone
